name: Christina Daves
offering: Book Marketing,Branding, Linkedin Training, Marketing Coach, Podcast Marketing, PR (Public Relations), Public Relations, Publicity Training, Social Media Marketing, Speaker Promotion
what_you_do: PR Strategist who teaches entrepreneurs and business owners how to get media coverage using her proven Get PR Famous Formula.
who_you_serve: Entrepreneurs, business owners, and authors on tight budgets who want PR results without hiring expensive PR firms.
social_proof: Over 1 billion views and over $100 million in sales from publicity for herself and clients. Featured in over 50 media outlets in less than 1 year. Serial Entrepreneur and Award-Winning Inventor. Featured in The Washington Post, NBC, Dr. Oz, Steve Harvey, Parenting magazine.
signature_programs: Get PR Famous Formula, PR for Anyone®, Experts Corner
business_focus: Teaching entrepreneurs and business owners how to get their own PR and media coverage without hiring expensive PR firms.
service_provided: PR coaching, PR strategy, PR courses, PR Shop resources
